value: L 1 35 Grafton St, Bondi Junction, 2022, NSW, Australia

4724 - Travel Agencies Summary > ADVENTURE WORLD TRAVEL PTY LIMITED (formerly NRMA TRAVEL NO.1 PTY LIMITED) is an Australian proprietary company. Its operations cover travel agencies. The company is not involved in the import or export of goods. ADVENTURE WORLD TRAVEL PTY LIMITED is headquartered in Bondi Junction, New South Wales. It is headed by managing director Edward Joseph Michael Holland. For the 2024 financial year, the company reported revenue of $38.45 million. Its net loss totalled $546,000. ADVENTURE WORLD TRAVEL PTY LIMITED forms part of the transportation, communications, electric, gas, and sanitary services industry sector. Key Personnel > No key personnel were found for the selected company.
